column2: Amber Heard is a dangerous liar. She should be investigated, prosecuted, and appropriately sanctioned as an example to others.
column26: Demand Amber Heard be charged with perjury, sign the petition
column33: Demand Amber Heard be charged with perjury, sign the petition
column34:
Amber Heard made up allegations of Domestic violence and Sexual assault against an innocent man. She then lied about it under oath, on the stand and in depositions.

We MUST hold anyone accountable who falsely accuses an innocent person of a crime. False allegations have been shown to make real victims afraid to come forward and when they do come forward they are believed less often.

For this reason alone we must make an example out of anyone who makes false allegations of this nature. Amber Heard actions were criminal and she should be charged with a crime.
column36:
We believe anyone who makes knowingly false allegations or perjures themselves in connection with false allegations, should be charged with a crime. This is especially true for false allegations of domestic abuse, rape and sexual assault. Every false allegation causes distrust in the next report of a similar crime. 

We've seen this over and over, and we have all heard the tale of the boy who cried wolf. False allegations like Ambers will eventually lead to the same results.

For this reason we ask Amber Heard be charged with perjury and prosecuted to the full extent of the law.
column165: Demand Amber Heard be charged with perjury, sign the petition
column166: Demand Amber Heard be charged with perjury, sign the petition
